pages.text: $(c)Wither$() is a hostile effect that can not normally be crafted.$(p)While inflicted with it, you will take damage every tick.$(p)Unlike Poison, this damage is lethal.

pages.title: Brewing Recipe
pages.text: This potion can be crafted with an Awkward Potion and a Wither Skeleton Skull.$(p)It can be extended, strengthend, or turned into a splash potion with the usual ingredients.
